name: The Ancestral Working of the Savage Peal

props.spellRulestext:
The Ancestral Working of the Savage Peal

The caster flings a bolt that bursts into a sonic explosion of force that strikes a target area. Affects a radius of 1 meter (.5 ") per point of force. It destroys barriers. Any barrier with armor equal to or less than force - 1 is destroyed. It deals force + net successes in damage to the stun condition track of living targets.
